remarks: Ordering property of addition.  Proposition 8.4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 58, limited to natural numbers, and its converse.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)
statement: nnaord $p |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om /\ C e. _om ) -> ( A e. B <-> ( C +o A ) e. ( C +o B ) ) ) $.
